title: M7: Explore word embeddings
authorComments: * DIFFICULTY: intermediate. * SUPERVISION: teacher-guided. * ESTIMATED ANSWERING TIME: 20 minutes. * LANGUAGE-SPECIFIC CONTENT: English. * ADAPTATION TO OTHER LANGUAGES: not possible as the tool has been trained with English data only. * COMMENTS FOR INSTRUCTORS: the tool needs to be introduced to the students before they can use it; check the documentation (see the icon with the question mark) first.
